g.text: Request advice on suitable explanation frameworks
Present proposed approach for ethical/regulatory review
Provide code for review of explanation generation
Generate sample explanation outputs in staging
Request doc clarifications for end-user understanding
Provide final explanation docs & best practices
Provide user documentation for compliance check
Confirm production environment explanation is active
Prepare support channels for user queries
Propose new or updated explanation method
Submit change request for ethical review
Provide user feedback on explanation clarity
Decide on future enhancements or confirm closure
